divs: Sighting DetailsMy son in law went outside the back door of his house to talk to wife and a friend. Was standing there, noticed nothing, no sounds, nothing. Looked up and saw these 3 lights in a triangle. Two ride and a green. Watch for a few minutes did and the thing just sat there. Took out his cell and took a picture. He did not tell anyone except his wife. Today, he we were having a family dinner and he pulled out the phone and said look at this. We all looked at the picture and thought what the heck. I had him send it to my email address so I could make the picture bigger. When you make the picture bigger, it actually looks like 4 circular with a dozen light. The son in law is really not into UFO's so he did not do anything more that just take the picture and forget about it. It resembles a lot of the pictures I have seen on the TV shows.
